text:
President Trump signs executive orders for coronavirus relief after negotiations with Democrats in Congress reach an impasse.

Democrats have promised to file a legal challenge, citing Congress' constitutional authority to determine federal spending. https://t.co/QNnQbpLfMU

text:
“Before I contracted it I thought, ‘It’s just made up, it’s all fabricated',” a fitness trainer said.

He was diagnosed with COVID-19 in March and subsequently spent 5 days in a medically induced coma. Now he wants others to learn from his missteps. https://t.co/EMQ79LLaxL

name: NBCNews
text: Doctors already use antigen tests to diagnose infectious illnesses like influenza or strep throat, and while not as sensitive as the polymerase chain reaction, widespread use of them could ease lab delays and help control "burning epidemics" across the US. https://t.co/kiV73ZOF9x
